title: The impact of secondary operating temperature on in-line coagulation/flocculation and fouling of membranes used in tertiary treatment
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00239C, Paper
Chen Tao, Wayne Parker, Pierre Bérubé
In-line coagulation/flocculation is a promising approach for fouling mitigation for membranes of tertiary treatment of wastewaters. However, the potential to minimize membrane fouling under low temperatures by optimizing coagulant dose...
